How it Works

Identify your target audience and use case
Build your design (or work with our team)
Integrate with your CRM to automate sends
Mail and kick off digital marketing campaign
Track results and see engagement increase 5x

Reach Your Ideal Audience 

Bring your own data, or use DirectMailers Data Services to build a targeted audience by segmenting on more than 1,000 data attributes. 

  • Acquire new leads with lookalike and demographic prospecting
  • Nurture existing leads by sending mail based on key actions and triggers
  • Retarget contacts with site visitor retargeting and reactivation
  • Build lifelong customer relationships with retention campaigns

Start with a Postcard or a Letter

Leverage the power of personalization with a design that is tailored to each individual contact -- using unique attributes from your CRM to transform direct mail. 
  • Individual messaging targeting specific contacts
  • Dynamically insert trackable, personalized QR codes
  • Bring your own design or work with DirectMailers Creative

Integrate with Digital Marketing Campaigns

Once delivered, trigger digital marketing follow up across channels for a holistic activation that drives 5x engagement -- leading to more conversion and sales. 
  • Target across social, display, and email channels
  • Augment messaging based on engagement 
  • Drive new leads to opt in to meet regulatory requirements 

Our Capabilities

DATA SERVICES

DirectMailers can build audiences, segmenting by 1,000+ data attributes. Using proprietary machine learning algorithms, DirectMailers will reach 80% of your target prospects and customers.

DYNAMIC DIRECT MAIL

Whether sending postcards or letters, add personalized QR codes or trackable CTAs to effectively engage consumers and drive conversion via one-time or programmatic programs.

PROGRAMMATIC CAMPAIGNS

From opting-in new prospects to building lifelong customers, DirectMailer offers programmatic campaigns aligned around key consumer milestones to spur engagement and drive conversion.

MULTI-CHANNEL MARKETING

Extend campaigns beyond direct mail with DirectMailers capabilities to align with other channels, like digital ads, outbound telemarketing, TV and radio, and personalized landing pages. 

SALES ENABLEMENT

With the ability to personalize and track direct mail, turn it into a lead generator for sales. Integrate with your CRM to trigger tasks and other actions, helping to prioritize hot leads to drive results.

REPORTING

See reporting by individual or campaign action so you know whats performing. Pre-formatted reports are available in real time, and custom reporting makes it easy to dig deeper into performance metrics.

WORK WITH US

All-in-one Direct Mail Programs That Deliver
